alert.note: Alert for Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 29 at 10:09AM HST until January 30 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... .A large northwest (310 degrees) swell will build down the island chain through the evening, peak overnight and early Monday, then decline Monday night. Wind waves from fresh to strong northeasterly winds will combine with the northwest swell to produce very rough conditions, especially on Kauai and Oahu through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...Waianae Coast, Oahu North Shore, Molokai Windward, Molokai North and Molokai West. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
